item.title: Rigid Barrier Sliding Door Lock – T-Handle Hex Key Administrative Control Item

numlitem.para: "Cargo Aircraft Only" dangerous goods are not carried on board the aircraft.
"Cargo Aircraft Only" dangerous goods shipments requiring inflight accessibility are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard R/H Pouch containing T-Handle Hex Key "T-HANDLE HEX KEY MISSING OR INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
